sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SERAMPEI, a country or district in the interior of the island of Sumatra. It has on the north and north-west Korinchi ; on the east, south-east, and south, Pakalang, Jambce, and Sungei-tenang ; and on the west and southwest, a river and chain of high mountains. It comprehends fifteen fortified and independent villages.
